search_results.title: DBC Pierre
search_results.snippet: DBC Pierre is an Australian author who wrote the novel Vernon God Little. Pierre was born in South Australia, and largely raised in Mexico.

search_results.title: Jeremy P. Pierre
search_results.snippet: Dr. Jeremy Pierre is dean of the Billy Graham School and Lawrence and Charlotte Hoover Professor of Biblical Counseling at Southern Seminary.
